summary: This is an email chain from December 2020 regarding the Epstein investigation, in which law enforcement personnel request assistance from a colleague named Kimberly to locate contact information for three individuals in order to serve subpoenas. The email identifies the individuals as Mandy, an unnamed person, and Eva Dubin.

persons.name: Kimberly
persons.context: Addressed in an email requesting help to locate contact information for three individuals for the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Author of the initial email requesting help from Kimberly to serve subpoenas on three persons for the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Mandy
persons.context: One of three persons listed for subpoena service; noted as possibly living in Florida.

persons.name: Eva Dubin
persons.context: One of three persons listed for subpoena service; noted as having several addresses in Manhattan.

connections.description: Paul is requesting investigative assistance from Kimberly to locate individuals for the Epstein investigation.
Paul is seeking to serve a subpoena on Mandy as part of the Epstein investigation.
Paul is seeking to serve a subpoena on Eva Dubin as part of the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Subpoena assistance request for Epstein investigation
events.description: Law enforcement officer Paul requests help from colleague Kimberly to locate contact information for three individuals to serve subpoenas as part of the ongoing Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: As of December 2020, the Epstein investigation was active, with law enforcement seeking to serve subpoenas on at least three individuals.
One of the individuals sought is named Eva Dubin, who reportedly had several addresses in Manhattan.
Another individual sought is named Mandy, who was possibly living in Florida at the time.
The correspondence indicates the use of a joint NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force in this investigative effort.
One of the three individuals subject to the subpoena request is not named in the provided text, indicating a redaction or omission.
